room_title: Escape room "Helter Skelter" by Mystery Room Houston in Houston
review: Had a blast at the Mystery Room in the Helter Skelter room! Paul (our guide) was super helpful and really made our Mystery Room night a wonderful time! I highly recommend.

room_title: Escape room "Helter Skelter" by Mystery Room Houston in Houston
review: We came to Mystery Room Houston as a company outing, and had a lot of fun escaping the Helter Skelter Room! Paul was a great host. I would definitely come back.

room_title: Escape room "Helter Skelter" by Mystery Room Houston in Houston
review: My son and his friends did the Helter Skelter room and had a blast! It was challenging but they made it out with 2 minutes 15 seconds to spare. The staff was awesome and really helped make the experience even better. Would recommend this to anyone and will definitely go back again!

room_title: Escape room "Helter Skelter" by Mystery Room Houston in Houston
review: Staff very friendly and help you in any way you need. Did the Helter Skelter room and it was very challenging and fun!! Definitely will return to try the other rooms!

room_title: Escape room "Helter Skelter" by Mystery Room Houston in Houston
review: We had a work event there - super fun time! The staff was great and very accommodating. Lindsay was really entertaining as our game master through Helter Skelter. I look forward to going back and soon!
